WidgetInfo.Description: This widget is used to show Google StreetView on the map
WidgetInfo.Label: Google StreetView

Parameter.Name: Target
Parameter.Label: Target
Parameter.Description: The frame, window, or TaskPane in which to display Google StreetView for the widget. If empty, a new window is used

Parameter.Name: SymbolLayerName
Parameter.Label: Symbol Layer Name
Parameter.Description: The name of layer that shows the navigator symbol on map

Parameter.Name: ShowDirection
Parameter.Label: Show Direction
Parameter.Description: Whether to show a line to describe the current direction of the camera

Parameter.Name: DirectionLength
Parameter.Label: Direction Line Length
Parameter.Description: The length of the line to describe the current direction of the camera

Parameter.Name: AdditionalParameter
Parameter.Description: A list of key/value pairs that will be added to the URL
Parameter.Label: Additional parameter
